overview:
Dean is an high energy and well connected entrepreneur with extensive experience in the Asia Pacific and Middle East markets primarily in tech start-up and start-up incubation

Dean is the founder of iNqubate. launched in 2002. iNqubate technology incubation company based across the Middle East and Asia and specialising in North American and European early funded technology companies wishing to make a calculated investment and foray into these two very lucrative markets. Prior to iNqubate Dean was involved in a number of start-up and expansion initiatives mainly in the technology space as part of focused management teams taking them through to a successful exit for the investors.

In 2008 Dean co-funded UM Labs, a VoIP Security Gateway company specialising in security critical VoIP infrastructure and mobile-to-land and mobile-to-mobile encryption addressing the ever increasing compliance and privacy space.
